item.title: Microservices: Credit cards Microservice
item.description:
Stores customer credit cards internally or in external PCI-complient service like Paypal

  • Server implementations: NodeJS
  • Communication protocols: Direct, Commandable HTTP, Commandable GRPC, GRPC
  • Persistence: Memory, Flat Files, MongoDB, Couchbase
  • Deployment options: Monolith, Process, Docker, AWS Lambda
  • Client implementations: NodeJS

item.title: Microservices: Reviews Microservice
item.description:
Keeps a list of supported reviews that are referenced from other content microservices.

  • Server implementations: NodeJS
  • Communication protocols: Direct, Commandable HTTP, Commandable GRPC, GRPC
  • Persistence: Memory, Flat Files, MongoDB, Couchbase
